RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over on the turf since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming races for $12,50 0 or less not considered in estimating allowances). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LORRAINE'S LEGACY stalked the pace while two wide on the backstretch, rallied three wide in upper stretch and split rivals while bumping DESSERT FIRST then drew away in late stretch while kept to a drive. DESSERT FIRST stalked the pace while three wide on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn then bumped with the winner in mid stretch and was second best in the end. GOTTA B KITTEN ME dueled for the lead while two wide on the backstretch, was in a long sustained drive turning for home but weakened in late stretch. LOTTA ROSES stalked the pace while inside on the backstretch, saved ground on the far turn and made a bid but came up empty in late stretch. INEEDAGIRLLIKEYOU dueled for the lead while inside on the backstretch, was in a long drive then gave way in the stretch. GYURZA was allowed to settled then raced four wide on the far turn making a bid but flattened out in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Ineedagirllikeyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside backstretch, long drive, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Gyurza
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 2nd turn, bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Gotta B Kitten Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide backstretch, long drive, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Lotta Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, saved ground, bid, empty late stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Lorraine's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2w, rallied, 3w, split horses, bumped, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Dessert First
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide backstretch, rallied, bump, 4w, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming races for $25,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVIL'S TOWER was allowed to settled while two wide into the turn, rallied on the turn and moved out to be four wide for the stretch drive, was put into a strong drive and powered to the front in mid stretch and was best in the end. W W HOTSHOT dueled for the lead while two wide into the turn, was in a long drive and dug in gamely but weakened in late stretch. HELA was inside and saving ground into the turn, made a bid in upper stretch but came up empty in late stretch. BOCA BOY dueled for the lead while inside into the turn, was in a long drive but gave way in late stretch. MEDICINE TAIL dropped back on the turn then was no threat in the stretch.

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside, long drive, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 35000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILVER CHILLER set a well handled pace from the start, drew away in mid stretch and was ridden out in late stretch. GOD GUNS N GUTS was settled in the early going then rallied three wide in upper stretch, was gaining ground and was up for the place in the end. LIL RIVER chased the early pace while two wide into the turn, made a bid then faltered in the drive. AMBER EDGE broke slowly from the gate then failed to menace. LAUREATE broke a step slow from the gate then dropped far back on the turn and was galloped out in the end.

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chiller
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, drew away late, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: God Guns N Guts
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied, 3 wide stretch, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Amber Edge
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil River
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide turn, bid, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Laureate
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow, dropped far back, no interest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 13 A llowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DREAM STREAK lunged at the start then was settled, was moved outside and rallied four wide to the top of the stretch, was in a strong drive and was best in the end. BALI DREAMIN dueled for the lead while two wide into the turn, was in a long drive and gamely dug in but tired in late stretch. STYLE turned her head just as the gates opened and got left in the gate, settled then rallied four wide in the stretch and was gaining ground in late stretch but was no menace. I DON'T KNOW MARGO dueled for the lead while inside into the turn, was hard used then gave way. SALLY'S SUPRISE was allowed to settled then failed to menace. LOVE OF MY LIFE chased the early pace while two wide, was used up then gave way in the stretch drive.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY CRAZY NEIGHBOR stalked the pace while tree wide into the turn, rallied and was in a long drive and bumped with G T FIVE HUNDRED in mid stretch and held sway in the end. G T FIVE HUNDRED was settled then rallied on the turn while four wide, was still four wide in upper stretch and was carried out in mid stretch and bumped the hung in the end. BALADINE was unhurried early then rallied along the inside in the stretch, was gaining ground in late stretch to finish well. GALLANT BUCK set the early pace and drew off into the turn, was in a long drive but weakened in the stretch. CHAD'S FLASH was inside and saving ground on the turn but failed to menace. TABLE MONEY was unhurried early then made raced three wide on the turn and failed to menace. MAGIC MONDAY was through early and gave way on the turn. A steward's inquiry was held concerning the stretch run. After reviewing the film's, the steward's disqualified MY CRAZY NEIGHBOR from first and was placed second for interference in mid stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Black Tie Affair H. HAWTHORNE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 103. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. ILLINOIS REGISTERED CONCEIVED AND/OR FOALED. No nomination fee. Nominees to pay $300 to pass the entry box and an additional $450 to start, with $75,000 guaranteed to be divided 60 percent to the winning owner, 20 percent to second, 10 percent to third, 5 percent to fourth, 3 percent to fifth and 2 percent divided equally among the remaining finishers. Starters to be named through the entry box by the usual time of closing. Trophy to the winning owner. Nominations clo sed June 29, 2023 with 13. In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: READTHECLIFFNOTES was allowed to settled then rallied on the far turn while three wide, was in a long sustained drive and proved best in the end. LAND MARK DEAL was allowed to settled while inside on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn and was gaining ground to be second best in late stretch. TEMPER TANTRUM was unhurried early then rallied on the far turn while three wide, was making a bid in the stretch but was no menace in late stretch. HUEY ATTACK set the aarly pace and drew off on the backstretch, was in a long drive but weakened in mid stretch. WILDWOOD SICILIAN was pressed the early pace from the inside then was taken back and angled outside to be two wide into the fat turn but was used up and faltered. IOYA AGAIN unhurried early and outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE TEARDROPS dueled for the lead while inside into the turn, was in a long drive in the stretch and put away UNCAPTURED DREAM in late stretch. UNCAPTURED DREAM dueled for the lead while two wide into the turn, was in a log hard drive but weakened in late stretch. NOBLE CREEKER was allowed to settled then rallied along the inside in the stretch and was no menace. INDICIA was allowed to settled while inside, rallied and moved out to be three wide in upper stretch, was gaining ground and was up for the place in late stretch.
